
## Materials from class

```{r}
#| label: slide-links
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
#| message: false

library(stringr)
f <- list.files()

# slides

n_slides <- sum(str_detect(f, "slides-?[a-zA-Z]*.html"))

if (n_slides > 0) {
    cat("#### Slides\n\n ")
}

if (n_slides == 1) {
    cat("- [Slides](slides.html)\n")
}

if (n_slides > 1) {
    slide_files <- str_subset(f, "slides-[a-zA-Z]*.html")
    slide_names <- slide_files %>%
        str_replace("slides-", "") %>%
        str_replace(".html", "") %>%
        str_to_title()
    for (i in seq_along(slide_names)) {
        cat(paste0("- [", slide_names[i], "](", slide_files[i], ")\n"))
    }
}

cat("\n")

# handouts

n_handouts <- sum(str_detect(f, "handout.pdf"))
if (n_handouts > 0) {
    cat("#### Handouts\n\n - [Handout](handout.pdf) \n")
}
```
